name: Monumento a los Martires de la Independencia

reviews.text:
This monument is dedicated to the memory of those who died during the Spanish War of Independence in 1809 against the Napoleonic troops.  Even if the reason for the memorial doesn't spring an interest in you, the actual memorial itself is worthy of seeing for its great size and beauty.

The memorial is enormous and striking and is located in a little square where people sell all sorts of items in a type of local village market square.
